Description: Fragment of marble stele, broken on all sides; Greek inscription at the front.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Hogarth 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis, A. Site and Buildings (p. 40, c)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 758, no. 25)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.18)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School at Athens
